ygData.subject: Re: Lost
ygData.msgSnippet: She smiled up at him. As silly this was, & so unlike her, but to finally get this opportunity, .... she would never let it go. Unsure what to do or how to act,

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

She smiled up at him. As silly this was, & so unlike her, but to finally get 
this opportunity, .... she would never let it go. 

Unsure what to do or how to act, let alone react. What could she do? 

But.. she liked the idea of stay near a moment longer. She wished it was 
longer, but beggers cannot be choosers. She was actually grateful for this 
opportunity. "Only a moment? Then we best spend it wisely," she purred. 

--part1_1a5.157add5b.2c200875_boundary
